    import {Light} from 'xeokit-sdk/src/viewer/scene/lights/Light.js'
    public class | source

    Light

    Extends:

    Component → Light

    Direct Subclass:

    AmbientLight, DirLight, PointLight

    A dynamic light source within a Scene.

    These are registered by Light#id in Scene#lights.
